Piotur:
So it's You - a mysterious messenger of the Divine.
Then listen. Recently Turek Orcs behave very strange. I always thought that my farm is safe... But the Orcs quite bolder and roam where they please.
Had to have the courage to follow them. I had the most terrifying experience! One Orc is acting really weird. Go to the well and you'll see.
I think the poor guy is scared as me. Imagine, he even asked me for help! Said that his countrymen were plotting something evil...
He's not like other Orcs, and will not attack on You. So do not be afraid.
(The next part of the job Letter Serenyi available after reaching 40th level.)
